title: Business rate devolution – spending it wisely (Greater London Authority)
text: ( Source : Greater London Authority ) Commenting on the Chancellor 's announcement that business rates will be devolved, Darren Johnson AM, Chair of the London Assembly Devolution Working Group , said: 'Devolving business rates to the Mayor was
